accounts.name: stake_authority
docs: Marinade makes a distinction between the `stake_authority`(proof of ownership of stake account)
and the `rent_payer`(pays to init the validator_record account). Both are required to be signers
for the instruction. These two accounts can be treated as one and the same, and here, they are.

accounts.name: gsol_mint_authority
docs: Used to ensure the correct GSOL mint is used

accounts.name: nft_mint
docs: by the impact nft program. If not, then it is not used (re-locking a lock account does not
result in a new NFT being minted)

accounts.name: gsol_mint_authority
docs: Used to ensure the correct GSOL mint is used

accounts.name: msol_token_account_authority
docs: Must be a PDA, but otherwise owned by the system account ie not initialised with data

accounts.name: msol_token_account_authority
docs: Must be a PDA, but otherwise owned by the system account ie not initialised with data

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: An error occurred when calculating an MSol value

errors.name: NotDelegated
errors.msg: Stake account deposit must be delegated

errors.name: InvalidUpdateAuthority
errors.msg: Wrong update authority for Sunrise state

errors.name: InvalidProgramAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Program Account

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Invalid Mint

errors.name: UnexpectedAccounts
errors.msg: Unexpected Accounts

errors.name: UnexpectedMintSupply
errors.msg: Unexpected gsol mint supply

errors.name: InvalidEpochReportAccount
errors.msg: The epoch report account is not yet updated to the current epoch

errors.name: DelayedUnstakeTicketsNotYetClaimable
errors.msg: Delayed unstake tickets for the current epoch can not yet be claimed

errors.name: TooManyTicketsClaimed
errors.msg: The amount of delayed unstake tickets requested to be recovered exceeds the amount in the report

errors.name: RemainingUnclaimableTicketAmount
errors.msg: The total ordered ticket amount exceeds the amount in all found tickets

errors.name: LockInsufficientBalance
errors.msg: The source gsol account does not have the required balance to lock

errors.name: LockAccountIncorrectState
errors.msg: The state of the lock account does not match the state in the instruction

errors.name: LockAccountIncorrectOwner
errors.msg: The owner of the lock account does not match the authority in the instruction

errors.name: LockAccountIncorrectTokenAccount
errors.msg: The lock token account does not match the token account in the lock account

errors.name: LockAccountAlreadyLocked
errors.msg: The lock account has already been locked - unlock before re-locking

errors.name: LockAccountNotLocked
errors.msg: The lock account has not been locked yet - lock before unlocking or updating

errors.name: LockAccountNotUpdated
errors.msg: The lock account must be updated to the current epoch before it can be unlocked

errors.name: LockAccountAlreadyUpdated
errors.msg: The lock account has already been updated to the current epoch. Cannot update twice in the same epoch.

errors.name: CannotUnlockUntilNextEpoch
errors.msg: The lock account was locked this epoch - wait at least one epoch before unlocking

errors.name: InvalidCalculation
errors.msg: Invalid calculation result

errors.name: AccountDiscriminatorNotFound
errors.msg: Account discriminator not found

errors.name: AccountDiscriminatorMismatch
errors.msg: Account discriminator did not match

errors.name: AccountDidNotDeserialize
errors.msg: Account did not deserialize

fields.name: liq_pool_proportion
docs: 0-100 - The proportion of the total staked SOL that should be in the

fields.name: liq_pool_min_proportion
docs: 0-100 - If unstaking would result in the proportion of SOL in the
liquidity pool dropping below this value, trigger an delayed unstake

types.name: SunriseTicketAccount
docs: Maps a marinade ticket account to a GSOL token holder
